statable: Run Stata Commands from R

Source: R/statable-package.R
statable-package.Rd

An R to Stata interface that allows Stata commands to be executed from within R. Data sets can easily be transferred between R and Stata, and Stata estimation results can be returned to R.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/james-atkins/statable
